mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(point_change), 0) AS total_saved_points FROM point WHERE mem_code = #{memCode} AND point_change > 0 AND created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND created_at < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01')

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ABS(point_change)), 0) AS total_used_points FROM point WHERE mem_code = #{memCode} AND point_change < 0 AND created_at >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND created_at < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01')
